name: Eye of the Storm
overview: A strategic shoot 'em up involving thieving, exploration, trading and more. The eye of the storm is Jupiter’s hot spot and that's where the action takes place. In the far future, life has been discovered in the lawless zone that is the Eye. Mercenaries there have contracts with live television and embark on missions which are broadcast throughout the solar system. The better the coverage, ie. the more blood and gore they score, the more money they earn. The player is one of these mercenaries, out to earn respect and cash by fair means or foul.
